name: Borbins of the Mineral Pond
description: Receiving aid from the Mohoe in a time of great need, the Borbins of the Mineral Pond were left with a deep seated gratitude towards the Mohoe. They're also known for their belief and allegiance to the semi-sentient forest, Amoria Now a member of a group researching the intersection of Groodu and Rootmason magics, they look towards the future with a glint in their eye. Their future is bright. The only question: what comes next?
